page.title: 10CRANAGE SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is a Church Aided school and is linked with St.Lukes in Holmes Chapel.We have assembly each morning with a hymn, a story and prayers.On Fridays the vicar joins us for prayers.Each term we go out on an educational visit. At Christmas we do a nativity play in the church, and have a party at school.Near to Easter we decorate eggs for a competition.The summer term sees us in the inter- schools Swimmimg Gala and our own sports afternoon. To end the year we have a service in church when the 4th years receive a Bible each. The 4th years go on to the Comprehensive which was opened six years ago,they will stay there until they are 16/18. The 4th years from Middlewich Road school also go there. Both schools are much bigger than ours 350 at Middlewich Rd.,1500 at the Comp
